# Problem 11.17 {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A beam of length L = 10 m is subjected to a distributed load as shown where w<sub>0</sub> = 35 kN/m. Determine the magnitude of the deflection at x = 0.55L. Assume EI = 15,000 kN-m<sup>2</sup>.
